items.name: ASGB6- Multiple House Consignment Simplified Arrival -No Discrepancies-

meta.name: ASGB6: Multiple House Consignment Simplified Arrival (No Discrepancies)

body.xml:
<ncts:CC015C PhaseID="NCTS5.1" xmlns:ncts="http://ncts.dgtaxud.ec">
    <messageSender>9999912345</messageSender>
    <messageRecipient>NTA.XI</messageRecipient>
    <preparationDateAndTime>{{preparationDateAndTime}}</preparationDateAndTime>
    <messageIdentification>{{messageIdentification}}</messageIdentification>
    <messageType>CC015C</messageType>
    <TransitOperation>
        <LRN>{{LRN}}</LRN>
        <declarationType>T1</declarationType>
        <additionalDeclarationType>A</additionalDeclarationType>
        <security>0</security>
        <reducedDatasetIndicator>0</reducedDatasetIndicator>
        <bindingItinerary>0</bindingItinerary>
        <limitDate>{{limitDate}}</limitDate>
    </TransitOperation>
    <Authorisation>
        <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
        <type>C521</type>
        <referenceNumber>XIAUTHDEP02</referenceNumber>
    </Authorisation>
    <CustomsOfficeOfDeparture>
        <referenceNumber>XI000081</referenceNumber>
    </CustomsOfficeOfDeparture>
    <CustomsOfficeOfDestinationDeclared>
        <referenceNumber>GB000060</referenceNumber>
    </CustomsOfficeOfDestinationDeclared>
    <CustomsOfficeOfTransitDeclared>
        <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
        <referenceNumber>GB000060</referenceNumber>
        <arrivalDateAndTimeEstimated>{{arrivalTime}}</arrivalDateAndTimeEstimated>
    </CustomsOfficeOfTransitDeclared>
    <HolderOfTheTransitProcedure>
        <identificationNumber>XI175521246821</identificationNumber>
    </HolderOfTheTransitProcedure>
    <Guarantee>
        <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
        <guaranteeType>1</guaranteeType>
        <GuaranteeReference>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <GRN>24XI0000010000031</GRN>
            <accessCode>AC01</accessCode>
            <amountToBeCovered>1000.00</amountToBeCovered>
            <currency>GBP</currency>
        </GuaranteeReference>
    </Guarantee>
    <Consignment>
        <countryOfDispatch>XI</countryOfDispatch>
        <countryOfDestination>GB</countryOfDestination>
        <containerIndicator>1</containerIndicator>
        <grossMass>4000.000</grossMass>
        <referenceNumberUCR>AB1234</referenceNumberUCR>
        <TransportEquipment>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <containerIdentificationNumber>WGPCGR</containerIdentificationNumber>
            <numberOfSeals>1</numberOfSeals>
            <Seal>
                <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
                <identifier>1234</identifier>
            </Seal>
        </TransportEquipment>
        <LocationOfGoods>
            <typeOfLocation>B</typeOfLocation>
            <qualifierOfIdentification>Y</qualifierOfIdentification>
            <authorisationNumber>XI DEP BT1 3ET</authorisationNumber>
        </LocationOfGoods>
        <DepartureTransportMeans>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <typeOfIdentification>30</typeOfIdentification>
            <identificationNumber>NC15REG</identificationNumber>
            <nationality>XI</nationality>
        </DepartureTransportMeans>
        <PlaceOfLoading>
            <country>XI</country>
            <location>Belfast</location>
        </PlaceOfLoading>
        <PreviousDocument>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <type>NMRN</type>
            <referenceNumber>24XI11111EXPORTMRN</referenceNumber>
        </PreviousDocument>
        <HouseConsignment>
            <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
            <grossMass>2000.000000</grossMass>
            <Consignor>
                <identificationNumber>XI175521246821</identificationNumber>
            </Consignor>
            <Consignee>
            <identificationNumber>GB953574106000</identificationNumber>
            </Consignee>
            <ConsignmentItem>
                <goodsItemNumber>1</goodsItemNumber>
                <declarationGoodsItemNumber>1</declarationGoodsItemNumber>
                <Commodity>
                    <descriptionOfGoods>Plastic toys</descriptionOfGoods>
                    <CommodityCode>
                        <harmonizedSystemSubHeadingCode>392690</harmonizedSystemSubHeadingCode>
                    </CommodityCode>
                    <GoodsMeasure>
                        <grossMass>1000.000000</grossMass>
                        <netMass>950.000000</netMass>
                    </GoodsMeasure>
                </Commodity>
                <Packaging>
                    <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
                    <typeOfPackages>BX</typeOfPackages>
                    <numberOfPackages>1</numberOfPackages>
                    <shippingMarks>XI Box to be shipped</shippingMarks>
                </Packaging>
            </ConsignmentItem>
            <ConsignmentItem>
                <goodsItemNumber>2</goodsItemNumber>
                <declarationGoodsItemNumber>2</declarationGoodsItemNumber>
                <Commodity>
                    <descriptionOfGoods>WHEAT</descriptionOfGoods>
                    <CommodityCode>
                        <harmonizedSystemSubHeadingCode>100119</harmonizedSystemSubHeadingCode>
                    </CommodityCode>
                    <GoodsMeasure>
                        <grossMass>1000.000000</grossMass>
                        <netMass>900.000000</netMass>
                    </GoodsMeasure>
                </Commodity>
                <Packaging>
                    <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
                    <typeOfPackages>BX</typeOfPackages>
                    <numberOfPackages>10</numberOfPackages>
                    <shippingMarks>WHEAT</shippingMarks>
                </Packaging>
            </ConsignmentItem>
        </HouseConsignment>
        <HouseConsignment>
            <sequenceNumber>2</sequenceNumber>
            <grossMass>2000.000000</grossMass>
            <Consignor>
                <identificationNumber>XI276531347831</identificationNumber>
            </Consignor>
            <Consignee>
                <identificationNumber>GB656584207000</identificationNumber>
            </Consignee>
            <ConsignmentItem>
                <goodsItemNumber>1</goodsItemNumber>
                <declarationGoodsItemNumber>3</declarationGoodsItemNumber>
                <Commodity>
                    <descriptionOfGoods>Bread</descriptionOfGoods>
                    <CommodityCode>
                        <harmonizedSystemSubHeadingCode>190590</harmonizedSystemSubHeadingCode>
                    </CommodityCode>
                    <GoodsMeasure>
                        <grossMass>1000</grossMass>
                        <netMass>950</netMass>
                    </GoodsMeasure>
                </Commodity>
                <Packaging>
                    <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
                    <typeOfPackages>BX</typeOfPackages>
                    <numberOfPackages>1</numberOfPackages>
                    <shippingMarks>Shipping marks for bread</shippingMarks>
                </Packaging>
            </ConsignmentItem>
            <ConsignmentItem>
                <goodsItemNumber>2</goodsItemNumber>
                <declarationGoodsItemNumber>4</declarationGoodsItemNumber>
                <Commodity>
                    <descriptionOfGoods>Cheddar cheese</descriptionOfGoods>
                    <CommodityCode>
                        <harmonizedSystemSubHeadingCode>040690</harmonizedSystemSubHeadingCode>
                    </CommodityCode>
                    <GoodsMeasure>
                        <grossMass>1000</grossMass>
                        <netMass>900</netMass>
                    </GoodsMeasure>
                </Commodity>
                <Packaging>
                    <sequenceNumber>1</sequenceNumber>
                    <typeOfPackages>BX</typeOfPackages>
                    <numberOfPackages>10</numberOfPackages>
                    <shippingMarks>Shipping marks for cheese</shippingMarks>
                </Packaging>
            </ConsignmentItem>
        </HouseConsignment>
    </Consignment>
</ncts:CC015C>

items.name: 07- GET ALL IE007 -IE043-  IE044 - IE025 - IE045

NCGB1- Multiple House Consignment unloading remarks with combined discrepancies -shortage of mass- shortage of packages- removal of item- addition of item- excess mass- excess packages- change of seal-
